name: Corn
description: A cereal plant that yields large grains, or kernels, set in rows on a cob.

name: Rambutan
description: The rambutan is a tropical fruit native to Southeast Asia. It is similar in appearance to lychee, with a hairy outer skin and sweet, juicy flesh inside. The fruit is typically red or yellow when ripe and is enjoyed fresh or used in various culinary dishes and beverages.

name: Bean
description: An essential legume in Mexican cuisine, with various varieties cultivated throughout the country.

name: Avocado
description: Fruit native to Mexico, essential for gastronomy and highly valued in international markets.

name: Chili
description: An indispensable element in Mexican cuisine, with a wide variety of cultivated species.

name: Tomato
description: Known locally as 'jitomate', it is widely used in Mexican cuisine.

name: Nopal
description: Edible cactus widely used in Mexican cuisine, symbolizing national culture.

name: Papaya
description: Tropical fruit cultivated on the coasts, popular in the local diet.

name: Coffee
description: Mainly cultivated in the southern and southeastern regions, it is an important export product.

name: Sugarcane
description: An important crop in sugar production and other by-products.

name: Lemon
description: Citrus fruit widely used in Mexican cuisine and beverages.

name: Mango
description: Very popular tropical fruit widely cultivated in various regions of the country.

name: Banana
description: Fruit widely consumed and cultivated, especially in southern Mexico.

name: Cacao
description: Base for chocolate production, mainly cultivated in the southeast.

name: Watermelon
description: Seasonal fruit, mainly cultivated in warm climates.

name: Melon
description: Another warm climate fruit, cultivated in various regions of Mexico.

name: Papaya
description: A smaller variety of papaya, popular in certain areas.

name: Tamarind
description: Fruit used in beverages and sweets, popular in various regions.

name: Guava
description: Tropical fruit cultivated in various regions, used in a wide variety of dishes and beverages.
